catentdesc.name: Hermitage Sunny Half-Zip Sweater
catentdesc.shortdescription: Half-zip sweater with sunny colorblocked stripes
catentdesc.longdescription: Let your boy light up the room with this half-zip sweater of sunny colorblocked stripes. The ribbing at the cuffs and the hem emphasizes the bright spirits. The mockneck will keep him warm and cozy.

catentdesc.name: Gusso Green Khaki Shirt
catentdesc.shortdescription: Green khaki shirt with front pockets
catentdesc.longdescription: This khakhi green shirt has front pockets and hemmed sleeves. In true sportsman style, this shirt has a brown shoulder panel with same brown repeated in a patch over the left pocket with gold stars embossed. Made of thin cotton blend, this shirt is suitable for the summer season.

catentdesc.name: Borsati Dual-Toned T-Shirt
catentdesc.shortdescription: Dual-toned t-shirt with purple shoulders
catentdesc.longdescription: This vibrant red and purple t-shirt displays a contrast in colours for a cool and spunky look. It has a ribbed collar and a two-button placket. The ribbed armbands at the short sleeves, which sets off the color contrasts, is eye-catching.

catentdesc.name: Luigi Valenti Green Striped T-Shirt
catentdesc.shortdescription: Green striped t-shirt with long sleeves
catentdesc.longdescription: This striped t-shirt in asparagus green with a ribbed crew neck has a loose comfort fit. The long sleeves make it suitable for layering in winters. Soothing to the eye, pair it with beige pants for a warm pleasing appearance.

catentdesc.name: Albini Blue T-Shirt
catentdesc.shortdescription: Classic blue t-shirt
catentdesc.longdescription: This classic blue t-shirt for toddlers is comfortable homewear for them to play around in. The short sleeves and the soft, mediumweight cotton material makes it ideal for summer. The t-shirt is tag-free for added comfort.

catentdesc.name: Versatil Bright Blue Striped T-Shirt
catentdesc.shortdescription: Bright blue striped t-shirt
catentdesc.longdescription: This blue t-shirt with contrast stripes in lighter blue and pink looks cute and dandy on a young one. Made of thin polyester blend, this t-shirt can endure a lot of wear and tear. Pair it with jeans for a color-coordinated picture.

catentdesc.name: Hermitage Brown Striped Pullover
catentdesc.shortdescription: Brown striped pullover
catentdesc.longdescription: With a crew neck and ribbing at the cuff and hem, this brown striped pullover is perfect for those nippy fall days. Looking natural in earthy tones, the brown hues match with pants of any color to create a coordinated outfit.

catentdesc.name: Gusso Woollen Baby Vest
catentdesc.shortdescription: Woollen baby vest in navy blue
catentdesc.longdescription: This cutesy woollen baby vest in navy blue is an adorable top for toddler boys. This vest is cable knit and follows the styling similar to adult vests. Team it with a shirt, jeans and tie and your baby will steal the limelight.

catentdesc.name: Borsati Blue Layered T-Shirt
catentdesc.shortdescription: Blue layered t-shirt with full sleeves
catentdesc.longdescription: The layered look of this t-shirt comes from extended sleeves and collar in a blue and white checks. The t-shirt has a two-button placket front. A popular trend in tween fashion, this t-shirt is suitable even for younger ages.

catentdesc.name: Luigi Valenti Brown Striped T-Shirt
catentdesc.shortdescription: Brown striped t-shirt
catentdesc.longdescription: This soft brown t-shirt with multi-colored stripes look charming on little boys. The thin stretchable and wrinkle-proof material has good wear and tear. The round neck and the full sleeves protect from unexpected gusts of wind.

catentdesc.name: Albini Blue Plaid Shirt
catentdesc.shortdescription: Blue plaid shirt with long sleeves
catentdesc.longdescription: A signature style in plaid and of cotton twill blend, this blue checks shirt has long sleeves with barrel cuffs and buttoned front pockets. With a shirttail hem and a box-pleated back, this shirt is a must have. The loose and comfortable fit makes it suitable for winter.

catentdesc.name: Versatil Orange Half-Zip Sweater
catentdesc.shortdescription: Orange half-zip sweater
catentdesc.longdescription: This half-zip sweater in flashy orange is tweed knit and thermally insulated to keep warm in colder temperatures. With a mockneck and a brass zip, this sweater displays ribbing around the neck, cuffs, and the hem. Pair it with khaki pants for an eclectic combination.

catentdesc.name: Hermitage White Striped Cotton Shirt
catentdesc.shortdescription: White striped cotton shirt
catentdesc.longdescription: This white cotton shirt features pale gray background stripes with a modern geometric pattern. The gray and black colors in the pattern stand out elegantly against the white backdrop. Appearing cool and fashionable on a little one, this shirt is summery and cozy for all occasions.

catentdesc.shortdescription: Orange and black striped t-shirt with long sleeves
catentdesc.longdescription: A long-sleeved t-shirt in bold stripes of orange and black, it is bright and trendy. The black around the round neck adds definition to the stripes. Simple yet charming, this t-shirt is practical and comfortable.

catentdesc.name: Borsati Classic Checkered Shirt
catentdesc.shortdescription: Classic checkered fitting shirt
catentdesc.longdescription: Chic and classy, this elegant shirt in small checks makes your young man look stylish. This pocketless shirt has a bias button panel. Shirttail hem and barrel cuffs further adorn the shirt.

catentdesc.name: Luigi Valenti Striped and Layered T-Shirt
catentdesc.shortdescription: Striped and layered t-shirt with multi-colored stripes
catentdesc.longdescription: A layered t-shirt in multi-colored stripes, the long white sleeves impart the layering look. The contrast-colored stripes presents a merry and pleasant appearance. The two-button placket collar and sleeves help cover from the wind and cold.
